summary: Antwerp is a major city in Belgium, known for its port, which is one of the largest in the world. It is located in the Flemish Region and is the capital of Antwerp Province. The city has a rich history and was once a significant cultural and economic center in Europe. Today, it is famous for its diamond trade and diverse population, with many nationalities represented. The city also has a unique nickname for its residents, "Sinjoren," which comes from the Spanish word for "lord."
title: Antwerp
